name: just for him - classic ribbed scarf
notes:
a free version of this pattern is available here: 
http://oombawkadesigncrochet.com/2016/06/classic-ribbed-scarf.html

scarf of the month club free crochet pattern for june!

this finished scarf (pictured) is 72 inches long by 5 inches wide.

you can make yours to whatever size you want! 

perfect for the men in your life - this classic ribbed scarf is a quick to make project too!

work a few up today for gifts this holiday season...

photos have been included to help you understand which loops to work into and how the turning chain works for the edging.

this lovely, stretchy fabric resembles knit stitches too! 

have fun! and please add your project pages!!

if you would prefer a ad-free pdf version of this pattern it is available here: [men's classic ribbed scarf][1]

xo
rhondda


  [1]: http://www.craftsy.com/pattern/crocheting/accessory/just-for-him---classic-ribbed-scarf/223196
